ovdesc.p: The COUNTRY.GROUP table allows countries to be grouped together for use in determining residence or non-residence when applying charges.

For example, charges and commissions can be different depending on whether the customer is resident or non-resident in the EEC. A country group can be set up which contains a list of all the countries which constitute the EEC. This group id can then be used instead of inputting all EEC member country codes in each charge record.
